signature: <T extends Schema<X>, X> DeferredChanged<ChangedSchema> diff(RecursiveSchemaSet, Components, Components, T, T, DiffContext)

enhanced_by.reason: The method 'getMapping' is used to retrieve mappings which are essential for the comparison logic in 'diff'.
The method 'getSchema' is used to retrieve schemas which are necessary for the comparison in 'diff'.
The method 'isApplicable' determines if the changes are applicable, which can be used to construct assertions for the 'diff' method.
The method 'compareAdditionalProperties' handles additional properties, which can inform the assertions for the 'diff' method.
